description.value: This value set includes all the Vaccine National Drug Codes (NDC). This source of this data is provided by the [CDC](https://www2a.cdc.gov/vaccines/iis/iisstandards/ndc_crosswalk.asp). A crosswalk between NDC and CVX is available in the [CDC NDC Lookup Crosswalk](https://www2a.cdc.gov/vaccines/iis/iisstandards/vaccines.asp?rpt=ndc)

purpose.value: Codes that are used as translations for CVX code for implementation of the Argonaut Immunization IG and MU2015 certification.
